fields.title_en: The Revolution in Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 5000
fields.content_en:
**NVIDIA** has officially announced the new **GeForce RTX 5000** series of GPUs, promising to take performance to the next level. Key innovations include:

- **Blackwell Architecture** ‚Äì a new generation of GPUs with even greater energy efficiency.
- **Up to 30% faster than the RTX 4000** in real-world gaming tests.
- **Revolutionary DLSS 4.0** ‚Äì even more FPS without quality loss.
- **Support for PCIe 5.0** for maximum data transfer speeds.

The sales are expected to start in **Q4 2025**, with prices beginning at **$999** for the base model.

üîú Looking forward to the first tests and comparisons with competitors!

fields.title: NVIDIA –ø—Ä–µ–∑–µ–Ω—Ç—É–≤–∞–ª–∞ –Ω–æ–≤–∏–π AI-—Å—É–ø–µ—Ä—á–∏–ø Titan X
fields.title_en: NVIDIA Unveils the New AI Superchip Titan X
fields.content_en:
**NVIDIA** has made a groundbreaking announcement ‚Äì the company has introduced **Titan X**, a new AI superchip that surpasses all existing solutions.  

üî• **Titan X Specifications:**  
- **500 billion transistors** ‚Äì a new record in microelectronics.  
- **800 TOPS** (trillion operations per second) ‚Äì peak AI computing power.  
- **Built-in TensorLink neural network** ‚Äì optimized for generative AI.  
- **Support for NVLink 5.0** to link multiple chips into a unified system.  

NVIDIA claims that **Titan X** will become the foundation for **next-gen supercomputers, AI labs, and cloud services**. Companies like **OpenAI, Google, and Tesla** are reportedly testing Titan X in their projects.  

üìÖ Sales will begin in **2026**, with a **$10,000** price tag per Titan X module.  

üîú The future of AI is here!

fields.content_en:
**Qualcomm** has officially unveiled the **Snapdragon 8 Gen 4**, set to power flagship smartphones in 2025.  

üî• **Key features of the chipset:**

fields.title_en: Vitalik in China Discovered a New Substance ‚Äì **Gamno**!
fields.content_en:
## The Ukrainian traveler made a revolutionary discovery  

During his journey through China, the famous Ukrainian traveler **Vitalik** accidentally made a **scientific breakthrough** that could change humanity‚Äôs future. While exploring an ancient temple on Mount Huangshan, he stumbled upon a **previously unknown substance**, which he named **Gamno**.  

üí° **What is Gamno?**  
This unique material possesses several groundbreaking properties:  
- **Superconductivity** at room temperature.  
- **Self-cleaning** ‚Äì any dirt on its surface disappears.  
- **Incredible strength** ‚Äì 10 times stronger than titanium.  
- **Eco-friendliness** ‚Äì decomposes without harming the environment.  

üî¨ **Where Can Gamno Be Used?**  
- **Space technology** ‚Äì for ultra-strong materials.  
- **Medicine** ‚Äì as an innovative antiseptic.  
- **Construction** ‚Äì a perfect alternative to concrete.  
- **Mobile devices** ‚Äì for ultra-light and durable casings.  

üåç **Global Reaction**  
Following the announcement, **Tesla, NASA, and Apple** have already expressed interest in purchasing the Gamno patent. Experts predict that by **2030**, this substance will become the foundation for constructing space stations.  

üìù **Vitalik‚Äôs Comment:**  
> ‚ÄúI was just looking for a place to sit, and I found the future of materials!‚Äù

fields.name: –ö–æ–º–ø'—é—Ç–µ—Ä ARTLINE Gaming X47WHITE (X47WHITEv62)
fields.description_en:
The ARTLINE Gaming X47WHITE (X47WHITEv62) is a stylish and high-performance gaming system designed for those who value not only power but also aesthetics. With its sleek white case and unique Tower White cooling system, this computer will not only be an excellent working tool but also a beautiful element of your workspace.

At the heart of the system is the 6-core AMD Ryzen 5 7500F processor, with a base frequency of 3.7 GHz and the ability to boost up to 5.0 GHz, allowing the processor to handle various tasks effectively. Whether you're playing the most demanding games or working on multimedia projects, this processor ensures excellent performance and fast data processing.

The Tower White cooling system provides effective heat dissipation, maintaining stable performance under heavy loads. The white lighting of the fans and case not only adds functionality but also creates an attractive visual effect, enhancing the atmosphere for a full-fledged gaming experience.

The computer is equipped with 32 GB of DDR5-5200 RAM, providing excellent speed and greater bandwidth. This allows you to work with resource-intensive applications, run multiple tasks simultaneously, and enjoy games without lag or stuttering. Such memory is ideal for both gaming and professional work with graphics, video, or modeling.

For data storage, the system uses a 1 TB NVMe SSD, which significantly accelerates the loading of the operating system, games, and programs. Thanks to this drive, data and file access will be fast, and the device will ensure quick and stable workflows.

The GeForce RTX 4060 graphics card with 8 GB of GDDR6 video memory provides excellent graphics in modern games. It enables smooth gameplay with high frame rates and realistic graphics thanks to ray tracing support and other NVIDIA technologies. It is also perfect for working with graphic and video editors, providing the necessary performance for professionals.

The ARTLINE Gaming X47WHITE (X47WHITEv62) computer is an excellent choice for those who want not only a powerful and stable gaming and work PC but also a stylish computer that will please the eye and seamlessly fit into any interior. With this computer, you'll get incredible performance, smooth gameplay, and a fantastic visual experience.

It has 16GB of video memory and offers excellent performance. The system is equipped with 32GB of DDR4-3200 RAM, ensuring fast operation and multitasking capabilities. The Asus PRIME H610M-K D4 motherboard supports all necessary interfaces and ports for peripheral devices. The compact QUBE NEPTUNE Mini case features a modern design with a glass panel and a dust filter to protect components from contamination. The case cooling consists of two 160mm RGB fans on the front panel and one 120mm RGB fan on the rear panel, which create impressive lighting effects and maintain an optimal temperature inside the case. The LED lighting of the fans is controlled via a special controller.

The ARTLINE Gaming X37v51 computer is an excellent choice for those who want to enjoy gaming and work at a high level.

fields.description_en:
The ARTLINE Overlord GIGA Windows 11 Pro (GIGAv61Win) is a powerful gaming PC with water cooling, created in collaboration with Gigabyte.

This computer features an exclusive design inspired by the God of War video game, made from aluminum and tempered glass.

The case is equipped with RGB lighting fans and dust filters on the top and bottom panels.

The computer runs on a 24-core Intel Core i9-14900KF processor with a frequency ranging from 3.2 to 6.0 GHz, cooled by the Premium 240mm WaterCooler Black system.

The system is equipped with 64GB of DDR5-6000 Gaming RAM, and storage includes a 1TB NVMe Gen4 Basic SSD and a 2TB HDD.

The Z790 GAMING X AX motherboard supports the Intel Z790 chipset and is paired with a GeForce RTX 4080 SUPER graphics card with 16GB of video memory.

The 850W power supply has an 80+ Gold certification, and wireless connectivity is provided by Wi-Fi 802.11ac/ax and Bluetooth 5.3 modules.

The operating system is Windows 11 Pro.

fields.name: –ö–æ–º–ø'—é—Ç–µ—Ä ARTLINE Gaming X77 Windows 11 Home (X77v118Win)
fields.description_en:
The ARTLINE Gaming X77 (X77v118Win) gaming computer combines high performance and stylish design. Equipped with a 20-core Intel Core i7-14700F processor with a clock speed ranging from 2.1 to 5.4 GHz, it delivers excellent multitasking and fast operation. 32GB of DDR5-6000 RAM ensure fast and stable system performance. The NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5070 Ti graphics card with 16GB of video memory provides high-quality graphics in modern games. The 1TB SSD M.2 NVMe offers fast data access and reduces application loading times.

The QUBE WIZARD case with RGB lighting and tempered glass on the side panel gives the computer a modern and stylish appearance. The cooling system includes two 160mm RGB LED fans in the front, one 120mm RGB LED fan at the rear, and two 120mm RGB LED fans on the top to ensure effective heat dissipation.

The 750W power supply with 80+ Bronze certification ensures stable operation of all components. The computer comes pre-installed with Windows 11 Home and includes a power cable.

Case dimensions: 490x210x442 mm; weight: 10 kg. Case color: black. The package includes the PC, technical passport, and power cable.

fields.name: –ö–æ–º–ø'—é—Ç–µ—Ä ARTLINE Gaming STLKR (STLKRv23)
fields.description_en: The ARTLINE Gaming STLKR Computer (STLKRv23) is a powerful solution for gamers and enthusiasts, combining high performance with stylish design. Equipped with a 6-core AMD Ryzen 5 7500F processor running up to 5.0GHz and a GeForce RTX 4060 8GB graphics card, it delivers smooth gameplay and stunning visuals. With 32GB of DDR5-6000 RAM and a 1TB M.2 NVMe SSD, it ensures fast loading times and responsive system performance. The CPU is cooled by a 240mm radiator liquid cooling system, and the QUBE STALKER MAX case with RGB lighting and tempered glass provides both stable operation and an attractive appearance. A 550W power supply with 80+ Bronze certification completes this powerful gaming PC, which boasts a thoughtfully designed build.

fields.description_en:
Enjoy your vivid victories on the screen of the MSI MAG 274QRF-QD E2 gaming monitor

With a high-resolution WQHD (2560x1440) LCD panel featuring Quantum Dot technology, a low 1ms GTG response time, and a high 180Hz refresh rate, this monitor gives you a tangible edge over your opponents. Packed with cutting-edge technologies, including Adaptive-Sync, this model is an excellent choice for competitive gaming.

Rapid IPS panel with outstanding image quality: accurate color reproduction and high brightness.

Special layer of nano-particles ‚Äî Quantum Dots ‚Äî delivers wide color gamut: 94% Adobe RGB, 98% DCI-P3, and 150% sRGB. This is especially important for professional visual content editing.

WQHD resolution: high resolution ensures crisp and detailed images.

Rapid Boost technology (180Hz + 1ms) ‚Äî a key advantage in fast-paced games that require precise and quick reactions.

Adaptive-Sync technology.

VESA DisplayHDR 400 standard ‚Äî extended dynamic range enhances contrast.

Mystic Light backlight: personalize your gaming setup.

Ergonomic stand: easily adjust the monitor's position for comfortable viewing.

Less Blue Light Pro technology: hardware-level reduction of blue light energy (wavelengths between 415 and 455nm).

AG Series (MSI ARSENAL GAMING) is designed for gamers who want to dominate the virtual battlefield. Inspired by the unmatched durability and reliability of military equipment, it offers a full arsenal for gaming. In addition to excellent technical specs, MAG devices boast a unique design that reflects the strong character of the entire series.

fields.description_en:
TUF Gaming VG249QL3A Gaming Monitor: 24" (23.8" viewable) Full HD (1920 x 1080), 180Hz, Fast IPS, ELMB, 1ms GTG, FreeSync Premium, G-Sync Compatible, Variable Overdrive, 99% sRGB, Height Adjustable

The 23.8-inch Fast IPS gaming monitor with Full HD (1920 x 1080) resolution and an ultra-high 180Hz refresh rate is designed for professional esports players and avid gamers.

1ms (GTG) response time and ASUS Extreme Low Motion Blur (ELMB) technology minimize motion blur for crystal-clear action.

Certified FreeSync Premium and G-Sync Compatible support ensures tear-free, stutter-free gameplay with variable refresh rate enabled by default.

Shadow Boost enhances visibility in dark scenes without overexposing bright areas, helping you spot enemies hiding in shadows.

Delivers 99% sRGB color gamut coverage for vivid and accurate color reproduction‚Äîideal for both gaming and content creation.

180Hz refresh rate & 1ms response time provide ultra-smooth visuals and lightning-fast response in shooters, racing games, and more.

AdaptiveSync support ensures compatibility with AMD FreeSync Premium, NVIDIA G-Sync Compatible, and VESA AdaptiveSync for fluid gameplay.

Extreme Low Motion Blur (ELMB) sharpens fast-moving visuals, maintaining clarity during intense action.

ASUS Variable Overdrive dynamically adjusts overdrive levels based on frame rates for the best performance in any game.

DisplayWidget Center offers intuitive on-screen control over monitor settings via mouse, eliminating the need to use OSD buttons.

Versatile connectivity options include 2√ó HDMI 2.0 ports and 1√ó DisplayPort 1.2, ensuring seamless compatibility with PCs and consoles.

fields.description_en:
Acer EK271EBI 27" Monitor (UM.HE1CD.E01) ‚Äî D-Sub / HDMI / IPS / 100Hz / 5ms / Full HD / AMD FreeSync / Low Blue Light

The Acer EK271EBI 27-inch monitor combines advanced technologies and high functionality, making it an excellent choice for both professional users and those who appreciate high-quality visuals at home. With its Full HD resolution and spacious 27" screen, it delivers sharp and detailed images‚Äîideal for graphic work, watching high-definition videos, and gaming.

The IPS panel with 178¬∞ wide viewing angles ensures consistent color accuracy from virtually any angle, which is essential for designers, architects, and content creators. A 3000:1 contrast ratio and 250 nits of brightness offer deep blacks and vivid whites‚Äîperfect for photo and video editing.

A 5ms response time and 100Hz refresh rate provide smooth visuals and responsive performance in fast-paced games and action scenes, while AMD FreeSync eliminates screen tearing, ensuring a seamless gaming experience. The anti-glare matte screen minimizes reflections, allowing comfortable use in various lighting conditions.

Equipped with both HDMI and VGA (D-Sub) ports, the monitor offers versatile connectivity to both modern and legacy devices. It also features tilt adjustment and VESA 100x100 mm compatibility for flexible mounting and improved ergonomics.

fields.description_en:
Admire your vibrant victories on the screen of the MSI MPG 274URF QD gaming monitor.
Equipped with a Quantum Dot LCD panel and UHD (3840x2160) resolution, this monitor delivers stunning color contrast and brightness. With a 160Hz refresh rate and a lightning-fast 0.5ms (GtG, Min.) response time, it provides a noticeable advantage over your opponents. It also incorporates the latest technology, including FreeSync Premium synchronization, making it the perfect choice for your gaming setup.

Key Features:

Rapid IPS Panel: Offers a 0.5ms (GtG, Min.) response time.

Quantum Dot Technology: Nanocrystals enhance light transmission, broadening the color palette and achieving high maximum brightness levels for vivid images and an expanded dynamic range.

4K UHD Resolution: Experience sharp, ultra-detailed visuals with the highest resolution.

160Hz Refresh Rate: Smooth gameplay without tearing, perfect for fast-paced action.

0.5ms (GtG, Min.) Response Time: Ensures clarity and responsiveness, minimizing motion blur.

HDMI 2.1 Interface: Supports 4K/120Hz mode with 48Gbps bandwidth, perfect for gaming consoles.

Ergonomic Stand: Convenient height adjustment and tilt options for improved viewing comfort.

VESA DisplayHDR 400 Certification: Enhances contrast with extended dynamic range.

AI Vision Technology: Automatically adjusts brightness, enhances colors, and reveals hidden details in dark scenes.

KVM Module: Manage multiple devices using one keyboard, mouse, and monitor.

Blue Light Reduction: Optimized to reduce blue light emission, minimizing eye strain during extended gaming sessions.

Less Blue Light Premium: Hardware solution to reduce harmful blue light without compromising image quality. Certified EYESAFE technology.

MSI HDR Technology: Supports enhanced detail, wider color range, and a more realistic image compared to traditional monitors. Supports Windows 11 Auto HDR.

Optix Scope: Built-in magnification allows for multi-level zoom with hotkeys to quickly switch between zoom levels. Perfect for sniping.

Smart Crosshair: Automatically changes the reticle's color, making it visible at all times, even in the most intense moments.

fields.description_en:
AOC U34E2M Monitor ‚Äì Immersive Productivity and Entertainment
34‚Äù VA Panel with Ultrawide QHD Resolution
The AOC U34E2M features a 34-inch VA panel with Ultrawide QHD 21:9 resolution, delivering an immersive viewing experience and significantly expanding your screen space for improved productivity and multitasking. HDMI and DisplayPort inputs ensure compatibility with various devices and content formats.

Wide QHD (WQHD) Resolution
With a resolution of 3440 x 1440, Wide Quad HD offers stunning clarity and detail, allowing you to see every nuance. The 21:9 aspect ratio is perfect for watching wide-format movies and diving into the latest games, while also giving you more workspace. The 8-bit color depth provides a broad palette for rich, natural visuals.

VA Panel
The Vertical Alignment (VA) panel delivers deeper blacks and higher contrast for vivid and lifelike images.

100Hz Refresh Rate
With a refresh rate twice as fast as standard monitors, you can say goodbye to stutter and blur. The 100Hz refresh rate ensures smooth visuals, clearer frames, and precise tracking ‚Äî ideal for fast-paced gaming or high-speed video playback.

HDMI Connectivity
Compatible with current-gen gaming consoles, modern graphics cards, and media players.

HDMI 1.3‚Äì1.4b: 144Hz @1080p, 75Hz @1440p

HDMI 2.0‚Äì2.0b: 240Hz @1080p, 144Hz @1440p, 60Hz @4K

Picture-by-Picture (PBP)
The PBP feature lets you connect and display content from two different sources simultaneously (e.g., a laptop and a desktop PC), ideal for multitasking, streaming, or monitoring multiple systems at once.

Flicker-Free Technology
AOC‚Äôs Flicker-Free technology uses a DC backlight system to reduce flickering, minimizing eye strain and fatigue ‚Äî perfect for long gaming sessions or extended work hours.

Low Blue Light
AOC‚Äôs Low Blue Light mode blocks harmful shortwave blue light without compromising color quality, unlike traditional filters that darken the image or shift tones to yellow.

Frameless Design
The sleek frameless design not only looks modern but also offers a seamless multi-monitor setup experience with minimal distraction.

Adaptive Sync
Adaptive Sync technology synchronizes your monitor‚Äôs refresh rate with the GPU‚Äôs frame rate, eliminating tearing, stutter, and input lag ‚Äî ensuring a smoother experience whether you‚Äôre gaming or watching high-speed video.

VESA Mount Compatibility
Mount your monitor exactly where you want it with VESA compatibility ‚Äî whether on a wall, multi-monitor stand, or ergonomic arm. The AOC Ergo Base also ensures stability and ease of adjustment.

3-Year Warranty
AOC backs each monitor with a solid 3-year warranty from the date of purchase. Any manufacturing defects or component failures will be repaired or replaced free of charge within this period.
